body.p: The Master Files Support is also useful for project-level validation and transformation scenarios. When you hover the cursor over a file in the Master Files directory, displays the Validate and Transform buttons at the right of the file. Select one of these buttons to run a transformation or validation scenario. If the current node is selected, executes a batch transformation and validation. If the current node is not selected, executes the validation and transformation for the current node only. The behavior of these actions is the same as the behavior of the corresponding actions that are available in the contextual menu. The tooltip of the Validate and Transform buttons displays the associated scenarios that you can apply.When you hover the cursor over the Master Files directory itself, also displays a Help button. Use this button (or press F1 on your keyboard) to open the Help section regarding the Master Files Support.
